verbs.description: [ARG1: at least six people] [V: injured] [ARGM-LOC: in related accidents on highway 4 bcn23] [ARG0: by bay city news service] as many as seven people were injured all but one of them seriously in two separate but related accidents tonight on state highway 4 near discovery bay in far eastern contra costa county the california highway patrol said the first accident was reported at 5 12 p m when a white subaru struck a motorcycle on eastbound highway 4 just east of the county highway j4 byron highway intersection the motorcyclist suffered major injuries according to chp officer brandon correia the subaru however drove away headed east on highway 4 where about 500 feet from the first accident scene it ran head - on into a westbound sedan believed to be carrying five people eden medical center subaru discovery bay officer brandon correia walnut creek california highway patrol john muir medical center castro valley east contra costa fire protection district contra costa county fire protection district contra costa chp bay city news contra costa county
